articles.title: Manchester United sale latest: Glazers looking to offload club since the summer - The Telegraph
articles.description: American owners have instructed the Raine Group, which helped broker £2.5 billion sale of Chelsea, as club's exclusive financial advisors
articles.content: While those close to the process said they could not rule out a sudden approach and the situation accelerating quickly, and that there were not the same complications presented by the Chelsea deal, s… [+1609 chars]

articles.author: Columbia Climate School
articles.title: Iron-Rich Dust From South America Played Role in Last Two Glacial Periods, Says Study - Columbia University
articles.description: Dust from the land that gets blown into the ocean appears to influence natural climate swings. A new study looks into where much of that dust came from in the past 260,000 years.
articles.content: Seafloor sediment from the South Pacific Ocean, seen here from the deck of the research vessel Polarstern, has opened a window onto how iron-rich dust blown from South America may have played a role … [+4915 chars]
